column4: every half an hour i get an orange, black, or blue ascreen and everythng halts
this machine passes 24 hrs of prime and memtest in win7
is there someplace i can look, or some logfile that might tell me what is going on?
/var/log/ holds logfiles
running the binary nvidia/ati driver?
I'm using hte abomination integrated ati video on an asus m4a78 mobo
did you activate the ati driver
and is it still OC'ed?
never OC'd, i ran prime & memtest to test stability at stock before blaming ubuntu or a driver
well the usual suspect would be the flgrx driver disable that and see if the problem occurs still?
syslog is a jungle
i will google how to disable the flgr driver and report back
thank you sir
system->administration->hardware driver
it says not activated, same for my atheros card
however, i am using wifi
it's an ar5005g card
i will try activating them, couldn';t hurt
there's a 1 second delay between hitting a key in irc and it showing up, maybe this will fix that too
means its using the open source driver
yeah thats not good
